verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ ذَاتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14402'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ج</tajweed>ِ
verses.translation: В знак неба, обладателя зодиакальных знаков

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَوْمِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14403'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَوْع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ِ
verses.translation: И в знак обещанного Дня (Последнего Суда)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَشَاهِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14404'>دٍ و</tajweed>َمَشْه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٍ
verses.translation: И в знак носителя свидетельства того, О чем свидетельствует он

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُتِلَ أَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14405'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأُخْد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ِ
verses.translation: Погубленными будут обитатели Огня

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َارِ ذَاتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14406'>ٱ</tajweed>لْوَق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ِ
verses.translation: Во рву, что беспрестанно полыхает

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٌ
verses.translation: Вот они сели над пылающим Огнем

verses.text_uthmani: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3560'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa hum 'alā mā yaf'alūna bil-mu'minīna syuhūd(un).
verses.translation: Свидетели того, что с верующими совершают

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا نَقَمُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِنْهُمْ إِلّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':386'>َن ي</tajweed>ُؤْمِنُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':32'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14407'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَزِيزِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7037'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā naqamū minhum illā ay yu'minū billāhil-'azīzil-ḥamīd(i).
verses.translation: И мучили они их лишь за то, Что в Достохвального и Всемогущего Аллаха Они уверовали (всей душой)

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱلَّذِى لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> مُلْكُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':555'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':177'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ‌ۚ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':72'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':3903'>َىْءٍ ش</tajweed>َه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Allażī lahū mulkus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wallāhu 'alā kulli syai'in syahīd(un).
verses.translation: В Того, Кому принадлежит Вся власть и в небесах, и на земле И Кто является свидетелем всего, (Что существует и вершится)

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':24'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ فَتَنُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14408'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':5718'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُؤْمِنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ لَمْ يَتُوبُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14409'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ق</tajweed>ِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innal-lażīna fatanul-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti ṡumma lam yatūbū fa lahum 'ażābu jahannama wa lahum 'ażābul-ḥarīq(i).
verses.translation: Ведь те, кто подвергал мученьям (иль соблазну) Мужчин и женщин, верующих (в Бога), И не раскаялся потом, Будут повергнуты в (жестокий) Ад, - Огонь им будет наказаньем

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ

data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innal-lażīna āmanū wa 'amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti lahum jannātun tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār(u), żālikal-fauzul-kabīr(u).
verses.translation: Для тех же, кто уверовал (в Аллаха) И праведные действия вершит, Наградой Райские сады предстанут, Прозрачною водою омовенны, - Великая награда от Аллаха

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ بَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14411'>طْ</tajweed>شَ رَبِّكَ لَشَد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٌ
verses.translation: Поистине, крепки тиски Господни

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> هُوَ يُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':10320'>بْ</tajweed>دِئُ وَيُع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ُ
verses.translation: Ведь Он один вершит первичное созданье, И Он один способен жизнь восстановить

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَهُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6227'>ٱ</tajweed>لْغَفُورُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14412'>ٱ</tajweed>لْوَد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ُ
verses.translation: Он добролюбия и всепрощенья полон

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ذُو <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11807'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَرْشِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14413'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَج<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ُ
verses.translation: Владыка Трона (Вседержавья) Достохвальный

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَعَّا<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6506'>لٌ ل</tajweed>ِّمَا يُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ُ
verses.translation: Вершитель всех Своих желаний

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: هَلْ أَتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كَ حَدِيثُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14414'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجُن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ِ
verses.translation: К тебе пришел рассказ о войске

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>َ
verses.translation: Фараона и самудянах

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بَلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':10932'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فِى تَكْذ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed>ٍ
verses.translation: И все ж неверные (упрямо) отвергают (Книгу)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12394'>ِن و</tajweed>َر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':14415'>ِم م</tajweed>ُّح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ط</tajweed>ُۢ
verses.translation: Аллах же карой схватит их со всех сторон

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْءَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14416'>نٌ م</tajweed>َّج<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٌ
verses.translation: И это достославный, истинно, Коран

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِى لَوْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14417'>حٍ م</tajweed>َّحْف<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>ظِۭ
verses.translation: В хранимой (тщательно) скрижали
